name: Arco Preciso
hero_image_alt: Arco Preciso flat burr grinder in brushed aluminium with a micrometric adjustment dial, ground coffee falling into a portafilter on the fork, close-up detail showing the stepless adjustment collar with engraved markings, set on a dark granite countertop with an espresso machine blurred in the background
headline: Precision you can feel.
subheadline: A 54mm flat burr grinder with stepless micrometric adjustment and low retention — built for the barista who dials in by feel and by taste.
description_short: A 54mm flat burr grinder with stepless micrometric adjustment and sub-1g retention for precise, repeatable espresso grinding.
description_long: The Arco Preciso is the grinder that changes what you think home espresso can taste like. Its 54mm hardened steel flat burrs produce a remarkably uniform particle distribution, and the stepless micrometric adjustment collar lets you make changes so fine you'll taste them before you see them. Retention sits below 1 gram, meaning what you dose is what you brew — no stale grounds contaminating your next shot. The Preciso handles espresso with authority and manages filter grinds with clarity. It is the grinder for people who have outgrown steps and are ready for a continuous spectrum of flavour.
use_case_headline: Perfect for baristas who taste the difference between grind steps.
use_case_body: The Preciso rewards attention. Small adjustments to the micrometric collar produce noticeable changes in body, acidity, and sweetness. If you're the kind of person who dials in a new bag over three or four shots, this is your grinder.

pairing_products.rationale: The Preciso's precision complements the Doppio's PID-controlled dual boilers for a balanced mid-range setup.
Stepless adjustment pairs well with the Studio's E61 group for dialling in traditional espresso.
A capable grinder that handles the variety of beans that different people bring to an office.
